MultiLens.Utils package¶

Submodules¶

MultiLens.Utils.constants module¶

MultiLens.Utils.utils module¶

MultiLens.Utils.utils.array2image(array)[source]¶

returns the information contained in a 1d array into an n*n 2d array (only works when lenght of array is n**2)

Parameters:array (array of size n**2) – image values
Returns:2d array
Raises:AttributeError, KeyError
MultiLens.Utils.utils.image2array(image)[source]¶

returns the information contained in a 2d array into an n*n 1d array

Parameters:array (array of size (n,n)) – image values
Returns:1d array
Raises:AttributeError, KeyError
MultiLens.Utils.utils.make_grid(numPix, deltapix)[source]¶

returns x, y position information in two 1d arrays
